title: Afghanistan's Taliban order women to cover up head to toe - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. Afghanistan's Taliban order women to cover up head to toe  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. Taliban decree orders women in Afghanistan to cover their faces  CNN
  3. Afghan women ordered to wear burqa  CBS Evening News
  4. The Taliban orders women to wear head-to-toe clothing in public  NPR
  5. Taliban order Afghan women to cover faces again  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: KABUL, Afghanistan (AP) — Afghanistan’s Taliban rulers on Saturday ordered all Afghan women to wear head-to-toe clothing in public — a sharp, hard-line pivot that confirmed the worst fears of rights activists and was bound to further complicate Taliban dealings with an already distrustful international community.
